sentences.sContent: It helps point out some of the behavioral barriers you have in making better food choices.
sentences.sContent_eng: It helps point out some of the behavioral barriers you have in making better food choices.
sentences.sCn: 而且当你在选择更好的食物的时候它也可以帮助你指出一些行为障碍。

sentences.sContent: Both my mother and grandmother were diagnosed with depression. I saw more behavioral symptoms in them, but I knew they were taking medication and they seemed to have it under control.
sentences.sContent_eng: Both my mother and grandmother were diagnosed with depression. I saw more behavioral symptoms in them, but I knew they were taking medication and they seemed to have it under control.
sentences.sCn: 我的母亲和曾祖母都曾被诊断为抑郁症，在她们身上我见得更多的是行为的异常，但我知道她们也用药并且症状控制得似乎不错。

sentences.sContent: From behavioral quirks to brain cancer, researchers have looked for any health risks associated with cellphone radiation for years.
sentences.sContent_eng: From behavioral quirks to brain cancer, researchers have looked for any health risks associated with cellphone radiation for years.
sentences.sCn: 从行为怪癖到脑癌，数年来研究人员一直在寻找与手机辐射有关的健康风险。

phrases.pCn: 行为经济学（经济学的一个范畴，研究实际决策程序对最后作出决策的影响）

words.tran: 行为；习性；运行状况（等于behavior）
